snippet: The little-known investment bank hired Greg Kennedy, formerly of UBS, and Robert J. Williams Jr., a onetime Washington Mutual president, as part of its growth strategy....

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The little-known investment bank hired Greg Kennedy, formerly of UBS, and Robert J. Williams Jr., a onetime Washington Mutual president, as part of its growth strategy.

headline.main: Disruptive Technology Advisers Hires Two Veterans of Finance
